BrainstormingÂ¶

Ideas from a discussion tonight: to create a project either a ‘real world’ project with a local non-profit where participants can learn more by taking on a more intensive project. Also to set up the web app workshop by using a more realistic web app but with lots of broken parts, and using the workshop time to fix it. Other ideas include a real or fake political campaign, since that kind of site would involve a lot of different pieces
